snippet: More U.S. consumers complained about imposter scams than identity theft for the first time in 2016, as fraudsters relied more on the phone and less on email to find victims, the Federal Trade Commission said on Friday....

headline.main: After Kansas Shooting, a Community in Fear
headline.print_headline: After Kansas Shooting, a Community in Fear

lead_paragraph: More U.S. consumers complained about imposter scams than identity theft for the first time in 2016, as fraudsters relied more on the phone and less on email to find victims, the Federal Trade Commission said on Friday.
